address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x73`. Sensor can be configured to `0x70`, `0x71`, `0x72`, or `0x73` using jumpers on the board.

*See also: [SEN0321 DFRobot Ozone Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sen0321.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [SEN0321 DFRobot Ozone Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sen0321.html#configuration-variables)*
